website_summaries.verdict: The Kensington SX 3000R speakers would make a decent addition to any iPod owner's kitchen or bedroom, but the frustrating radio integration makes it a poor choice for FM-seekers.
pros: The Kensington SX 3000R speakers come with a remote and offer decent sound quality
cons: The Kensington SX 3000R speakers offer frustratingly imperfect controls and spotty FM reception
Radio has no autoscan feature and presets are difficult to navigate

customer_reviews.title: Love these are the best for helping my high schooler ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these are the best for helping my high schooler staying organized and they are made well. I used to buy the paper folder for his 3 ring binder and they would break within the first week. Love the different pockets in same folder.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Klein

customer_reviews.title: These folders are great for writing portfolios for my students
customer_reviews.text: These folders are great for writing portfolios for my students. However, they were not the colors I had chosen and took longer than expected to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holes dont go threw the photo
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice. But I must of got a bad batch. The holes does not go threw the folder like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping my papers in order and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: They still look like they are brand new and are holding their shape ...
customer_reviews.text: These are holding up for the duration of the school year. They still look like they are brand new and are holding their shape and materials well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Baker

customer_reviews.title: You are only buying ONE folder.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize I was only buying *ONE* folder with 4 pockets. From the pictures I thought I was buying a pack. Who pays six dollars for a single folder? Me, in this case, sadly. If I can find a better deal I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mumper

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep papers together in one folder!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for warranty packages at work and they hold a lot of documents and are very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy M Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Very durable didn't break in the span of a month like my student's old paper folders. We will continue to use these for school from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Schwalbe

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: This product is too big for the Five Star zip up folder I got it to go in.
customer_reviews.author: Fry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great durable folder! Last all year for my daughter’s homework
customer_reviews.author: Jbeach222

customer_reviews.title: Great folders, but you may receive the wrong color pack
customer_reviews.text: Great folders, but I received the wrong colors. I selected the primary 4-pack but received the trend 4-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Colors care from the picture
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Be aware they may ship different colors from the photo. I received, bright colors (green, white, blue, pink)

customer_reviews.title: Not The Colors Pictured...
customer_reviews.text: These folders are functional for organizing client files. There are no bright color options as pictured. Misleading because most people based their decision to buy from what is shown. Just blue, black, red and green.
customer_reviews.author: Phi Phi

customer_reviews.title: My daughter used them last year and absolutely loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used them last year and absolutely loved them!!! Held up well... Needless to say we bought them again.. I reviewed the product not amazon- we also received the wrong colors
customer_reviews.author: tra

customer_reviews.title: The product is exactly as listed and I don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as listed and I don't have a problem with that other than I have ordered 3 separate times specifically wanting the shown colors of green, white, dark blue and teal and every time I kept getting the red, black, gray and blue. It has been rather frustrating and I will be sending them all back.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Anne Bertelsen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: they show super cute colors on the order but they are actually red, black, dark green, and blue.
customer_reviews.author: Mands33

customer_reviews.title: Good folders but the colors received (red
customer_reviews.text: Good folders but the colors received (red, black, dark blue and dark green) did not match what was depicted in photos (white, purple, light blue, light green)
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie LaGalia

product_meta.title: Five Star 4-Pocket Folder, Quick-View, Plastic, Folders with Pockets, Color Will Vary (33168)
product_meta.description: Color:Assorted| Size:1 PackLASTS ALL YEAR. GUARANTEED!* This Five Star folder will help you stay organized throughout the school year. The folder has a 4 pocket design. 1 pocket is on the left, and 3 layered pockets are on the right side for organization options. The layered pockets are color coded and have tabs, which gives you space to store documents for multiple classes. Plus, the durable plastic construction is built to last and can withstand everyday wear and tear. Folder is 3-hold punched, so you can store it in your favorite Five Star binder. It holds 8-1/2" x 11" papers and is available in assorted colors, including: Black, Red, Green, Blue, Teal, White, Purple and Lime. Note: Color choice is not available for this item. Color shipped to you is selected at random, and will vary. *ACCO Brands will replace any Five Star folder that is returned within one year from the date of purchase. This guarantee does not cover damage due to abuse. Contact ACCO Brands Consumer Affairs for instructions.
feature_bullets: 1 pocket is on the left, with 3 layered pockets on the right for organization options. Layered pockets are color coded and have tabs for easy navigation.
Durable plastic construction can withstand everyday wear and tear throughout the school year
3-hole punched to store in your favorite Five Star binder
Holds 8-1/2" x 11" papers. Available in assorted colors, including: Black, Red, Green, Blue, Teal, White, Purple and Lime.
